website_summaries.verdict: This rugged machine is an ideal option for those who want top quality but don't need the most powerful or expensive model.
pros: Spacious cast iron table and solid steel cabinet
Helical cutterhead cuts accurately and fairly quietly
At around 328 pounds, it's easier to handle than larger models
cons: Pricey, but it's just a few steps from the top-of-the-line competitors

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is the most incredible piece of equipment I own. It was very accurate right out of the box no adjustment necessary. I was using a Jet model and this is Light Years better than the Jet. It is a very heavy piece of equipment so you will need help assembling it once it arrives. The helical blades make this unit extremely quiet. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a high quality jointer.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: really solid machine - love the Helical Cutterhead - easier to feed and smoother results
customer_reviews.text: Had a Jet planer that I used for years, built a wheeled platform so I could move it around my garage, and then it tipped over and offset the tables to a point I could not fix them. Looked for a replacement and found the Powermatic. What a difference. Weighs a ton, but also bought the wheelbase and so solid and easy to move. the Helical cutterhead is so much better then the 3 knives I had in the Jet, easier to replace, smoother cuts, and no tear out at the end. Pricey but worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: William Ziska

customer_reviews.title: I love this jointer
customer_reviews.text: I love this jointer. I am very happy that I went with the helical head. Setup was very easy, and the quality of my work has gone up since getting this machine. I tried using my 2" dust lines with a reducing fitting but discharge area quickly clogged with shavings. I am currently allowing the waste to fall on the floor and have to sweep up the pile. Even without the dust collector connected there was little air pollution as most of the pieces were heavy and just fell into the pile. This was my first Powermatic tool, and I will be muting more after this great experience.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this unit to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Its Powermatic, I believe that speaks for itself. I am an aspiring hobbyist with no desire to have a woodworking business. That being said, I recommend this unit to anyone. I have had no problems with it. The helical cutter head is a dream. If I could change anything about my order it would be to get an 8" unit. I don't need it today but I may in the future. In closing, I love this unit and the quality if great.
customer_reviews.author: Rich M.

customer_reviews.title: Best 6” jointer
customer_reviews.text: SSSSOOOOOOO NICE! Works flawlessly, hooked it up to 220V for the extra power. Smooths boards perfectly like butter, easy to setup (grab a second person to mount the sled to base). Easy to adjust, fence aligned at exactly 90 degrees on first try.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Helical blade is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Went from a 6” Delta to this Powermatic. No comparison. Hands down best purchase I’ve made in a while
customer_reviews.author: Joe D. Rockey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine, precise, powerful, quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to set up and calibrate, nice precision controls for setting cutting depth and angle. Very heavy duty. Helical cutterhead comes with several spare carbide inserts and special tools. Glass-smooth, laser straight cuts.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Glass shiny surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Gives glass shiny surfaces on hardwood. Quiet running. Nicely finished with flat surfaces. Spiral design with individual cutters eliminates blade adjustment calibration. A bit heavy to assemble, but accurate out of the box. You will need a helper so don't alienate your friends.
customer_reviews.author: R. Startzman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I set this up myself...was a bit heavy but can be done. Once set up, with excellent instructions, amazing piece of equipment. Fairly quite...cuts great...dust port works excellent...leaves a smooth finish....couldn't be happier. My first piece of Powermatic and now I see what all the fuss is about.
customer_reviews.author: Liendeni

customer_reviews.title: The product was so close to being dead on straight, right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Jointer, strong, quiet and was as close to being straight right out of the box. Spent 15 minutes with the fence and a digital gauge to wire it in. Love my new jointer.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wprked grate right out of the box on time and it works
customer_reviews.author: James H. Alphin

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I not found anything negative to say about this jointer. It is a very solid well made machine, easy to setup, and performed perfectly. I highly recomment.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Wow !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The helical head is amazing. Clean cuts, quiet and easy to set up with help. This thing is heavy. I squared up some 120 year oak ( this stuff is almost as hard as rock ) 2x6s and 1 1/2 x 12 poplar boards. It went through both like butter. There is no lack in quality either. You are getting what you pay for. I recommend if you have the funds
customer_reviews.author: Rattboy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Does an outstanding job and came easy to assemble and easy to adjust to dead on specifications.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wettlaufer

customer_reviews.title: Wish the on/off switch was up top for better accessibility. Easy to assemble out of the box ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellently built jointer. Wish the on/off switch was up top for better accessibility. Easy to assemble out of the box - if you have two friends with good backs - and nice to have the choice between 115 and 220 volt operation. Helical heads are worth the money spent for them. Take plenty of paper towels as the machine is well-coated by the factory. Wax it as the steel is not stainless and will stain if water-based material falls on it.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Flecker

customer_reviews.title: Solid and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid and powerful machine. Fence and tables are easy to use and adjust. Helical cutter-head does a nice job. Set-up was very quick. When assembling and locating, keep in mind this is a heavy machine, but this adds great stability and dampens vibrations, helping to produce smooth cuts. I am a woodworker and not a machinist, but I have found the fit, finish, and overall construction of the Powermatic tools to be excellent, very satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Finbar

customer_reviews.title: Runs smoothly and finishes surfaces nicely. Pretty heavy
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. Fence is slightly warped but didn't seem to affect operation even on 12 foot boards. Runs smoothly and finishes surfaces nicely. Pretty heavy, but my wife and I (Were mid 60's) got it down to basement OK and assembly was straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Marotta

customer_reviews.title: No Need to Ever Buy Another Jointer
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased the Powermatic Jointer as a gift for my brother. Per my brother, who is a very accomplished woodworker and has a complete wood shop, the jointer is a dream. He believes he'll never need to get another jointer due to the quality and ease of handling. Sorry I can't provide any detail, but suffice it to say he loves the jointer.
customer_reviews.author: EllieC

customer_reviews.title: What a machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding machine! It is solid and well-built. The set up was easy (other than requiring lots of muscle to lift the bed on to the base) and the fine tuning calibration required was minimal and easy to accomplish. The helical cutter produces a surface that could be finished "as is" without any sanding. It is the best jointer I have ever used and I expect it will last a long time given the quality of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is NOT a one person job, it takes two people to lift and position the large pieces. After going through all the steps to make the necessary adjustments and making my first test cut it works wonderfully. This machine has different locks and adjustments then the Powermatic Jointers I have used in the past. I really do like the helical cutterhead over the three knife cutter heads, much less kickback. It took awhile to receive it from the factory but worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Cmac

customer_reviews.title: Well built machine. Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Was somewhat apprehensive about the weight as I was the only one available to move to the shop which is in a basement. Every unboxing video showed two people assembly. Managed to move and assemble on my own after removing all but the table from the box.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Treber

customer_reviews.title: Buy It Now!!
customer_reviews.text: the helical head on this jointer is beyond belief my favorite tool, now. do not buy a jointer that uses the old 3 knife cutterhead! this is absolutely the Cadillac of jointers.run a 6' board thru it and you will know why.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jointer
customer_reviews.text: The helical cutter head really makes this unit. It is much quieter and the way it cleanly works figured woods is amazing. The build quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

product_meta.title: Powermatic 1791317K 54HH 6-Inch Jointer with helical cutterhead
product_meta.description:
Style:Jointer1791317K Features: -6'' jointer with helical cutterhead.-54HH. Assembly Instructions: -Assembly required. Dimensions: -Dimensions: 37.5'' H x 24'' W x 66'' D.

AMAZON.COM
The Powermatic 54HH Six-Inch Jointer with Helical Cutterhead features a superior finish and quieter operation compared to conventional cutterheads with its helical cutterhead with 40 four-sided, indexable carbide knife inserts. Designed and built to make your wood-straightening tasks easy and accurate, this heavy-duty jointer will remain a vital part of your woodworking shop for years to come.



Power and Stability
To provide stable footing--the key to optimum accuracy--the 54HH has a 21- x 13-inch (W x D), all-steel base cabinet that puts the table surface at a comfortable 32 inches above the floor. The one-horsepower, one-phase, 115-/230-volt motor (pre-wired for 115 volts) is factory-mounted within the base cabinet and can be converted to use 230-volt power. The motor is on a special mount for easy belt-tension adjustments, and the fine/quick adjustment lever on the infeed table ensures precision cuts.The base also contains the dust collection chute that evacuates debris from below the cutterhead via the exterior four-inch-diameter port near the floor--a design that keeps the hose out of the way to prevent tripping accidents.

Helical Cutterhead
There are many cutterhead designs that carry the helical moniker, including simple straight blades broken into segments and dispersed around the cutterhead cylinder. Despite the helical label, they retain many of the liabilities of the long-blade designs. However, the 54HH features a true helical cutterhead with specially machined carbide inserts arranged in spiral-shaped rows for effective--and incredibly quiet--performance.

The inserts also have a four-inch radius ground into them and are mounted so they approach the wood at a 14-degree angle. This creates a true shear cut that eliminates much of the impact and the resulting fiber disturbance other cutterhead designs deliver. Also, the durability of the carbide combined with the low-impact, shear cutting action mean the inserts have an extended life.

Precision Ground Cast-Iron Tables
With a length of 66 inches and a width of 7-1/2 inches, the main precision-ground cast-iron table is one of the longest available in this class, providing plenty of support for large workpieces. It's conveniently mounted on dovetailed ways that keep it perfectly aligned through height changes. Adjustments are easy: the outfeed table height is adjusted with a handwheel mounted below the table; to adjust the infeed table, the handle can be moved up and down for coarse height changes or, the long handle can be rotated to make fine, precise height adjustments.

High-Performance Fence System
The all-cast-iron fence system has a length of 38 inches, height of four inches--and like the tables--is precisely ground to ensure straightness. The supporting and tilt mechanism, made up of large cast-iron pieces, make this system as accurate and repeatable as it is durable. For versatility, the fence tilts up to 45-degrees towards and away from the tables.

Also, fully adjustable stops at 90 degrees (vertical) and each 45-degree position make set-up fast and help keep the 54HH accurate with minimal maintenance, while center-mounted controls make for easy operation.

The 54HH is backed by a five-year warranty.

What's in the Box
54HH Jointer assembly; one stand; one door with mounting hardware; one dust chute with mounting hardware; one fence assembly; one pulley cover; one belt; one cutterhead guard; two push blocks; one fence handle; one manual; one warranty card; and one hardware bag.
